Mechanism of the Machine 
 



Video 01:46 minutes  
 

Video 02:10 minutes  
 
GeniusOM | Geniusॐ Compactor | Full Video 

Video 04:44 minutes     GENIUS-OM COMPACTORGeniusOm is a start-up which has patented the solution for the disposal of rubbish: a device able to compact most type of waste. Its appearance is similar to most household appliances making it suitable for schools, hospitals, airports, planes and ships.The machine has been conceived to sort waste in different categories: paper, metals, undifferentiated and wet waste.There are three available models at the moment suitable for domestic, condominiums and hospital employment, which will all be using the same patented mechanism.The domestic version is the same size of a common household appliance. The machinery has different section for each type of waste and compacts each one, making it possible to throw waste away once a week rather than on a daily bases.Special filters for wet waste are also provided. Moreover, the company is planning a generator able to transform organic waste into energy. ZERO WASTEThe GENIUSOM machinery was developed for domestic and urban use. It reduces significantly the amount of urban waste, making the disposal and separate collection of wet, plastic, metal and paper waste possible. PATENT COMPACTOR THREE TYPES OF GENIUSOM COMPACTORThe device can be used in both a domestic and public environment. The downsizing of different waste is done by the same machinery.Due to its reduced handy and technological size it can be considered just like any other household appliance and therefore essential for public and domestic comfort.The size of the two modesl  for public use varies depending on its employment, in schools, hospitals, restaurants, hotels and condominiums. COMPANY DESCRIPTION AND TARGET MARKETGeniusOm was funded to provide a real solution to the disposal of community waste. Its objective is to develop, produce and sell a selection of compactors for the separate collection of waste.The devices will have a great price/performance ratio. Even if the prototype is still to be produced, the main project and the specification of the product are completed.The company commends a team of engineers, experts in measuring and control systems and in the production of industrial machineries.The key to the success of GeniusOm is in the ability of the team to handle and create a wide variety of innovative products and to subsequently sell it with a good price/quality ratio to a wide market.The co-founders of GeniusOm are valued experts, whose experience will generate a synergy in support of modern society. A RADICAL SOLUTION TO THE VOLUME AND SEPARATE COLLECTION OF WASTEOPERATING PRINCIPAL OF THE MACHINARYCompressing machinery powered by compressed air, for domestic and community waste, with a unique press air-operated.The power derives from an air compressor, made of a surface with five, variable, sections joint to a pneumatic piston, which when activated allows the compression of all the waste found in the sections of the device.The result is a  compacting of urban and domestic waste and a separate collection of wet waste, plastic, paper, metals and even glass in a separate section. The compressed waste is collected separately at the bottom of the device. FIELD OF BUSINESS AND PRODUCTSThe main field of business of GeniusOm consists in the production and selling of waste compactor.The company’s aim is to be become part of the household appliances market with an innovative solution for separate waste collection.Thanks to its patented project, GeniusOm will produce a domestic compactor and a bigger version appropriate for public places such as hospitals, hotels, restaurants, schools, universities, etc. COMPETITIONThe models proposed by competitors have some clear disadvantages, first of all they are rotating compactors, that provide the transition and compression of waste via opposite cylinders, positioned in the top part of the device. The sensor is activated by the machinery when it detects waste or hand-operated, but the most important detail is the ability of the device to compress just one residue at a time.Moreover these models have a single narrow slot in for waste making its employment highly uncomfortable for the user. At the moment the market is composed by companies that produce and sell:Hand operated compactors, which can be placed on a wall, envisage the user to compress a whole bag of waste at a time by placing it under the lever, this is a cheap but clearly inconvenient solution.Single compressing bins which make the purchase of various units, for different refuse, compelling and do not, however, compress a large quantity of waste.Single section, electric compactors which do not solve the separate waste collection problem.Prototype models of separate waste collection compactors, which we consider our direct competitors, which are pricey solutions and do not guarantee the compression of all types of waste. GENIUSOM UNIQUE COMPACTOR FOR ALL WASTEThis innovative device, represents a practical solution and a radical change to the problem of domestic and community waste solving the problem at its source.The machinery, by compacting all kinds of community waste, solves the problem of waste disposal at its origin.Our product, allows the compression of all waste and can really represent a revolution in the way community waste is handled.It represents the ultimate and concrete solution to high amounts of refuse and separate waste collection.THE GENIUSOM MACHINERY WAS INVENTED FOR DOMESTIC AND URBAN USETHE MACHINE HAS BEEN CONCEIVED TO SORT WASTE IN DIFFERENT CATEGORIES: PAPER, METALS, UNDIFFERENTIATED AND WET WASTE.THERE ARE THREE AVAILABLE MODELS SUITABLE FOR DOMESTIC USE, CONDOMINIUMS, SCHOOLS, UNIVERSITIES, HOSPITALS, RESTAURANTS, HOTELS, MALLS, STATIONS, PORTS, AIRPORTS, PLANES AND SHIPS. ALL THE MODELS USE THE SAME PATENTED MECHANISMTHE MACHINERY, BY COMPACTING ALL KINDS OF COMMUNITY WASTE, SOLVES THE PROBLEM OF WASTE DISPOSAL AT ITS ORIGIN.THIS INNOVATIVE DEVICE, REPRESENTS A PRACTICAL SOLUTION AND A RADICAL CHANGE TO THE PROBLEM OF DOMESTIC AND COMMUNITY WASTE SOLVING THE PROBLEM AT ITS SOURCE. fig.1fig.2 ZERO WASTEGENIUSOM UNIQUE COMPACTOR FOR ALL WASTE. STORYGeniusOM Compactor, Luca Falace's Invention and Patent COSTS INCURRED BY LUCA FALACE FROM THE YEAR 2013 TO THE YEAR 2016 AND FOR HIS INVENTION GENIUSOM COMPACTOR PROJECTInvestment total cost of 53,000 euros incurred only by Luca Falace: patent fees, events, contacts, marketing, company ', processing drawings and documents, prototype simulation, project presentations, marketing, participation in events, participation and personal presence in awards and awarded prizes, etc. GENIUSOM COMPACTOR Certification and Summary  THE YEAR 2014 For all these reasons the Geniusom Patent has received considerable and important awardsin the Green Economy field:   GENIUSOM PRIZE ECOMONDO 2014 WITH THE ACCESSION OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE ITALIAN REPUBLIC AWARD FOR SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENTGeniusOM Compactor, Luca Falace's Invention and PatentGeniusom Prize Ecomondo 2014 THE YEAR 2015 FINANCING FUNDS NOW APPROVEDGENIUSOM COMPACTOR, 
SHARK TANK ITALY, CHANNEL ITALIA1
 Italian television network MEDIASET, CHANNEL ITALIA1, on the 4th of june, 2015.GeniusOM Compactor, Luca Falace's Invention and PatentShark Tank Italy, Mediaset, channel Italia1​, 2015The financing of 250 thousand Euros, to finance the industrial prototype of the compactor geniusom, was never receved by me. The 99% of the competitors winners, whose project was approved during the television programme SHARK TANK ITALY 2015, weren’t financed by the the financers, hosted on the programme, because of the lack of money. This television programme was on the air on the important, serious and professional Italian television network MEDIASET, CHANNEL ITALIA1, on the 4th of june, 2015.GeniusOM Compactor, Luca Falace's Invention and PatentShark Tank Italy, Mediaset, channel Italia1​, 2015 THE YEAR 2016

Compressed air machinery with a compressed air press whose floor is equipped with a plurality of five and it is fixed to a pneumatic piston [a] which in its compression action enables the top press to compress any waste present in the five different sections of the machinery, in order to be collected separately in the light air containers available at the bottom of the machine.2. Compressed air machinery characterized by the fact that the compressed-air piston enables the top of the press, to make inside of the five modules, or the five sections in which the five major municipal waste are present :organic-wet , glass, plastic, metal, paper, the waste collection with the reduction of the eighty percent of the original volume of all major municipal waste.3. Machinery according to claim 2 characterized by the fact that the portion of rectilinear motion of the press, which goes to compress on municipal waste contained in modules, acts in a differentiated manner in the related compartments at the end of the compression proces4. Machinery according to claim 3 allows the differentiation of compressed waste deposited with a reduction of the eighty percent of the original volume.5. Machinery according to claims 1 to 4, characterized by the fact that the device which allows the action of ignition may be variable: with one or more pistons up to five, as many as the section modules of differentiation, with a single switch or individual switches for how many modules housing the waste, with a single foot, or a foot for each form of waste. This depends on the industrialization of machinery; for household or public use, or for practical and economic variants, as regards the production of machinery.6. Machinery according to claims 1 and 4, characterized by the fact that after the user has introduced each differentiated waste in the appropriate container by means of a small door, the press can work only when all five doors are closed hermetically.7. Machinery according to claims 1,3,4 characterized by the fact that when the compression process is over, it reduces the size eighty percent of the volume of waste in each module. The compressor waste is conveyed in the individual sections, before their extraction. At the base of each module there is a removable drip tray for emptying the accumulated liquids . In this container it is conveyed the fluid resulting from the compression of the waste ,especially the organic one, and all the others in a smaller quantity: glass, plastic, metal, cardboard. Regarding the section, in particular the form of organic waste-wet, at the base of this form of machinery, there is a drip tray greater than all the others.8. Machinery according to claims 1 to 7, characterized by the fact that the deposit of the four waste: glass, plastic, metal, cardboard can lie in the conteiner until this is filled and ready tobe emptied.9. Machinery according to claims 1 to 8, characterized by the fact that all the sections that collect wet waste are subject, at each compression, simultaneously to a sterilization action of the compressed matter.10. story:
Rhino Conservation, Expansion ranges and Protection Project

Be a part of saving this ancient and endangered species from extinction. This is a conservation project with a wider social impact and community initiative

We are raising money to assist in Phase 1 of the establishment of a rhino sanctuary in Botswana.

The actual project site is a designated wildlife reserve, registered non profit and has the President of Botswana’s endorsement. The continued plunder of the rhino due to illegal poaching is well documented and is set to continue until every single rhino has been slaughtered unless a comprehensive and disruptive plan is put into place. As intelligent people, we all understand that arresting the demise of the rhino is going to take more than setting aside land and providing armed guards for the rhino.

The Hokoyo Board have the experience and skills needed to not only ensure the conservatory has the ideal habitat, ecosystem and conditions for the rhino, they also have direct experience in securing government participation, community outreach and buy in, local capacity building, early warning systems, disruptive technology and communication, protection and sustainable business modeling.

The team are all African, who are experts in their field and have operated extensively in Africa. All are donating their time and experience because they know if something is not done soon, by them, there will be no future for the rhino.

Extinction Is Forever

Hokoyo Wildlife Foundation is a Southern African not for profit foundation. Julie Anne Edwards, Hokoyo’s founder is one of the Rhino Girls, who rode bicycles from Edinburgh to Victoria falls, Zimbabwe to raise money to save the rhino.  Still true to her mission, Julie established the Hokoyo Foundation in order to:

  • Assist in the ethical conservation of the Rhino and Africa's unique wildlife and cultural heritage.
  • Help our communities to develop skills that improve their individual lives, nurturing in a spirit of compassion, dignity and respect towards one another and our natural world.

The Impact

This initial phase 1 of the project is to raise money to support the feasibility study of the site in Botswana, including sending experts to assess the site, the finalizing of the business plan, local community and champion engagement and consultation.

Included will be the identification of local community capacity building and assessing local resources for the building of community based warning systems and conservation education. Building a sustainable project includes the creation of recurrent sources of self-generated funding and strategic partnerships.

Through resourceful planning, time donated and literally working off the smell of an oil rag, we have brought the amount we need for this phase down to £1000,00. We appreciate this is a big ask, but we are creating an amazing model that will be the future of conservation.

However, anything over and above the money raised will go directly into the project and towards the next phase of the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everybody can contribute financially. Increasing the global awareness of the illegal trade in Rhino horn is an important element in the fight against the extinction of the Rhino.

Please log on with either Facebook or Twitter and share this project. On Twitter we are using the hashtag #StopPoaching

We are looking for a corporate sponsor too. Because we are approaching the project in phases and ensuring a sustainable business plan is built, the project presents an ideal opportunity for corporate sponsorship.

Thank you for spending the time to consider supporting our cause.

Learn more about Hokoyo Wildlife Foundation on our website http://www.hokoyowildlife.org

 

 

The Cover of Hokoyo, a book written by Julie Anne Edwards

 

Digital Audit

The company digital audit perk has been donated by Social Presence, a digital creative agency. The Agency will look at your current digital footprint, giving an experienced analysis on how you are currently being viewed by the public. The agency normally charges £500 for this type of audit.

story:
(English version at the bottom)

 

Impact Positif

Depuis que l'ère industrielle a commencé, l'humanité n'a cessé d'avoir un impact négatif sur notre planète. Aujourd'hui dans notre monde en expansion, les techniques et les moyens évoluent enfin vers la possibilité d'avoir un impact non seulement neutre, mais positif sur notre planète et son écosystème.

En 2008 lors d'une conférence sur l'estime de soi, j'ai été touché par l'importance de la responsabilité que nous avons sur les différents problèmes que nous rencontrons. En plus simple, si nous savons que quelque chose est négatif et destructeur pour nous ou notre environnement et que nous ne faisons rien, notre estime de nous va diminuer. Depuis ce jour, je ramasse les déchets que je trouve sur mon chemin.

Bien sûr, je n'étais pas comme cela avant et mon parcours professionnel fut longtemps dans les plaisirs éphémères que sont l'hôtellerie et la restauration. Aujourd'hui je me suis rendu compte que je pouvais avoir un impact beaucoup plus important en aidant les personnes à avoir une vie meilleure et ultimement je me rends compte que ma mission est encore plus belle en amenant aujourd'hui ce projet d'Impact Positif.

En 2012, j'ai entendu parler des gyres de plastique dans nos océans et ai aussi suivi une formation avec comme orateur Peter H. Diamantis. Il nous a expliqué le levier qu'il avait utilisé pour la création du Ansari XPrice permettant le développement des futurs voyages commerciaux dans l'espace.

En mettant toutes ces données ensemble, je me suis rendu compte qu'il fallait aujourd'hui créer un levier suffisant pour soulever l'intérêt non seulement des particuliers mais aussi des entreprises afin d'avoir dans un futur proche un impact positif sur notre planète.

Pourquoi vous impliquer.

En contribuant à ce projet, vous allez permettre la mise en place d’une compétition avec un prix qui récompensera l'entreprise, l'équipe ou la collectivité qui trouvera le moyen de:

1) Récupérer le plastique à la surface de la mer et à 100 mètres au-dessous du niveau marin avec le taux de récupération le plus élevé et le plus grand rendement de récupération en respectant la faune et la flore marine.

2) Être en mesure de transformer tout ce plastique en énergie facilement transportable et utilisable.

 

Presque 80% des 250 milliards de kilos de plastique produit chaque année ne sont pas recyclé. Au lieu de cela, il est déposé dans des décharges souvent à ciel ouvert et il est facilement emmené vers les océans, endroit où il s'accumule dans un tourbillon de déchets marins, parfois appelé gyre. Une de ces gyres, appelée aujourd'hui communément  "continent de plastique" a été découverte par hasard par le navigateur Charles Moore en 1997. Au retour d'une course à la voile entre Los Angeles et Honolulu, l'explorateur avait décidé de prendre une route habituellement évitée par les marins, au centre de la gyre du Pacifique Nord, où les pressions sont hautes et les vents faibles. "Jour après jour, je ne voyais pas de dauphin, pas de baleine, pas de poisson, je ne voyais que du plastique", se souvient-il.

Plusieurs expéditions ont été menées dans cette zone de 3,4 millions de km2, que l'on surnomme le "Great Pacific Garbage Patch" (la "grande poubelle du Pacifique"). On y dénombre 334 271 fragments de plastique par km2 en moyenne, avec des pics à 969 777 fragments par km2. La masse de plastique y est six fois plus élevée que celle du plancton, pour un poids estimé de plusieurs dizaines de milliers de tonnes à plusieurs millions, selon les études.

La pollution plastique marine se développe à une vitesse de 5 milliards de kilos chaque année. Le plastique se dégrade aussi plus lentement en milieu marin en raison de la réduction de l'exposition aux rayons UV et des températures plus fraîches.

Les déchets qui peuplent les océans proviennent en effet à 80 % des terres, portés par le vent ou les rivières – le reste tombant des navires de commerce. Jusqu'alors, les débris flottants étaient détruits par les micro-organismes, mais cela n'est plus le cas avec l'arrivée des plastiques, essentiellement du polyéthylène, du polypropylène et du PET, qui constituent 90 % des déchets maritimes. Or, ces quantités ne cessent d'augmenter.

Les animaux peuvent se tromper facilement et confondre le plastique avec des aliments, ils ingèrent cette matière toxique, qui peut alors se déplacer dans la chaîne alimentaire et peut nuire à l'homme. Toute la chaîne alimentaire est affectée puisque les plus petits morceaux sont ingérés par des oiseaux, de petits poissons qui seront à leur tour mangés par de plus gros... Ainsi, Greenpeace estime qu'à l'échelle de la Terre, environ 1 million d'oiseaux et 100 000 mammifères marins meurent chaque année de l'ingestion de ces plastiques.

La pollution plastique océanique présente également une menace qui pèse sur les collectivités côtières et le tourisme, la navigation et l'industrie de la pêche.

Aujourd'hui la réglementation, la fiscalité et l'interdiction des produits en plastique spécifiques ne suffisent pas à empêcher l'entrée dans l'océan de ces tonnes de déchets et ne tient pas compte du fait que la pollution plastique marine restera dans nos océans pendant des centaines, voire des milliers d'années.

 

Comment rendre ce projet concret.

Afin d'avoir un levier suffisant, le montant idéal du prix que nous devrions pouvoir proposer devrait être de $10'000'000. C'est le montant qui a été utilisé pour le Ansari XPrice permettant aux 26 équipes combinées de créer une nouvelle industrie qui a généré jusqu’à aujourd’hui plus de 1,5 milliards d’investissement dans l’industrie publique et privée du voyage spatial.

Ce projet étant bien plus grand que je ne pourrais jamais l’être, j’ai besoin de votre aide à tous les niveaux et la moindre contribution que vous pouvez apporter sera une pierre supplémentaire inestimable.

Vous pouvez aider de différentes façons, la première étant en faisant passer ce message et en encourageant les gens à venir s’investir avec vous dans ce projet.

Vous pouvez aussi nous aidez en utilisant vos différentes compétences.

Nous recherchons des personnes volontaires qui s’engageraient à nous aider à développer les points suivants :

Développement d’un site internet

  • Promotion du projet
  • Promotion sur les réseaux sociaux
  • Graphisme
  • Création de vidéos
  • Administration et suivi des donations
  • Création d’une fondation
  • Gestion d’une fondation
  • Toutes autres aides dont vous pourriez avoir l’idée

 

Afin de récolter les fonds suffisants, j’utiliserai différentes plateformes de « crowfunding » c’est pourquoi le montant de don que je désire atteindre sur Indiegogo est de $ 100'000. Montrons que les contributeurs utilisant Indiegogo sont les plus responsables et qu’ils peuvent s’engager pour bien plus que les autres.

Quand l’objectif de $10'000’000 sera atteint, la plus grande partie des fonds seront utilisés comme prix pour les équipes engagées dans la compétition.

 

Si l’objectif de $10'000'000 n’est pas atteint je propose d’utiliser les fonds de la façon suivante:

En dessous de $60’000 la totalité des fonds seront versés à une fondation ou une association œuvrant dans les mêmes sens qu’ « Impact Positif »

Entre $60'000 et $500'000 je m’engage à créer une fondation pour gérer ces dons et consacrer une année complète de mon existence pour promouvoir et défendre ce projet sur une plus grande échelle et approcher les plus grandes fortunes de ce monde pour le finaliser avec eux.

Entre $500’000 et $10'000’000  Création d’une fondation mettant en place la compétition « Impact Positif »

Plus de $10'000’000 Création d’une fondation mettant en place la compétition « Impact positif » et développement de projet similaire sur le long terme.

 

En vous engageant avec nous, vous aidez l’humanité à prendre ses responsabilités face à son passé et au futur de notre planète.

 

« Une fois que nous savons et que nous en sommes conscients, nous sommes responsables de nos actions ou de notre inaction. Nous pouvons faire quelque chose à ce propos ou l’ignorer. Dans les deux cas nous sommes toujours responsable. »

Jean Paul Sartre

 

En vous remerciant de vos dons

Patrick de Sépibus
story_txt:
(English version at the bottom)
 
Impact Positif
Depuis que l'ère industrielle a commencé, l'humanité n'a cessé d'avoir un impact négatif sur notre planète. Aujourd'hui dans notre monde en expansion, les techniques et les moyens évoluent enfin vers la possibilité d'avoir un impact non seulement neutre, mais positif sur notre planète et son écosystème.
En 2008 lors d'une conférence sur l'estime de soi, j'ai été touché par l'importance de la responsabilité que nous avons sur les différents problèmes que nous rencontrons. En plus simple, si nous savons que quelque chose est négatif et destructeur pour nous ou notre environnement et que nous ne faisons rien, notre estime de nous va diminuer. Depuis ce jour, je ramasse les déchets que je trouve sur mon chemin.
Bien sûr, je n'étais pas comme cela avant et mon parcours professionnel fut longtemps dans les plaisirs éphémères que sont l'hôtellerie et la restauration. Aujourd'hui je me suis rendu compte que je pouvais avoir un impact beaucoup plus important en aidant les personnes à avoir une vie meilleure et ultimement je me rends compte que ma mission est encore plus belle en amenant aujourd'hui ce projet d'Impact Positif.
En 2012, j'ai entendu parler des gyres de plastique dans nos océans et ai aussi suivi une formation avec comme orateur Peter H. Diamantis. Il nous a expliqué le levier qu'il avait utilisé pour la création du Ansari XPrice permettant le développement des futurs voyages commerciaux dans l'espace.
En mettant toutes ces données ensemble, je me suis rendu compte qu'il fallait aujourd'hui créer un levier suffisant pour soulever l'intérêt non seulement des particuliers mais aussi des entreprises afin d'avoir dans un futur proche un impact positif sur notre planète.
Pourquoi vous impliquer.
En contribuant à ce projet, vous allez permettre la mise en place d’une compétition avec un prix qui récompensera l'entreprise, l'équipe ou la collectivité qui trouvera le moyen de:
1) Récupérer le plastique à la surface de la mer et à 100 mètres au-dessous du niveau marin avec le taux de récupération le plus élevé et le plus grand rendement de récupération en respectant la faune et la flore marine.
2) Être en mesure de transformer tout ce plastique en énergie facilement transportable et utilisable.
 
Presque 80% des 250 milliards de kilos de plastique produit chaque année ne sont pas recyclé. Au lieu de cela, il est déposé dans des décharges souvent à ciel ouvert et il est facilement emmené vers les océans, endroit où il s'accumule dans un tourbillon de déchets marins, parfois appelé gyre. On y dénombre 334 271 fragments de plastique par km2 en moyenne, avec des pics à 969 777 fragments par km2. La masse de plastique y est six fois plus élevée que celle du plancton, pour un poids estimé de plusieurs dizaines de milliers de tonnes à plusieurs millions, selon les études.
La pollution plastique marine se développe à une vitesse de 5 milliards de kilos chaque année. Le plastique se dégrade aussi plus lentement en milieu marin en raison de la réduction de l'exposition aux rayons UV et des températures plus fraîches.
Les déchets qui peuplent les océans proviennent en effet à 80 % des terres, portés par le vent ou les rivières – le reste tombant des navires de commerce. Jusqu'alors, les débris flottants étaient détruits par les micro-organismes, mais cela n'est plus le cas avec l'arrivée des plastiques, essentiellement du polyéthylène, du polypropylène et du PET, qui constituent 90 % des déchets maritimes. Or, ces quantités ne cessent d'augmenter.
Les animaux peuvent se tromper facilement et confondre le plastique avec des aliments, ils ingèrent cette matière toxique, qui peut alors se déplacer dans la chaîne alimentaire et peut nuire à l'homme. Toute la chaîne alimentaire est affectée puisque les plus petits morceaux sont ingérés par des oiseaux, de petits poissons qui seront à leur tour mangés par de plus gros... Ainsi, Greenpeace estime qu'à l'échelle de la Terre, environ 1 million d'oiseaux et 100 000 mammifères marins meurent chaque année de l'ingestion de ces plastiques.
La pollution plastique océanique présente également une menace qui pèse sur les collectivités côtières et le tourisme, la navigation et l'industrie de la pêche.
Aujourd'hui la réglementation, la fiscalité et l'interdiction des produits en plastique spécifiques ne suffisent pas à empêcher l'entrée dans l'océan de ces tonnes de déchets et ne tient pas compte du fait que la pollution plastique marine restera dans nos océans pendant des centaines, voire des milliers d'années.

Afin d'avoir un levier suffisant, le montant idéal du prix que nous devrions pouvoir proposer devrait être de $10'000'000. C'est le montant qui a été utilisé pour le Ansari XPrice permettant aux 26 équipes combinées de créer une nouvelle industrie qui a généré jusqu’à aujourd’hui plus de 1,5 milliards d’investissement dans l’industrie publique et privée du voyage spatial.

story:
One Technology to Change the World!

  • To provide fresh water for agriculture and potable water for populations.
  • To restore surface water supplies such as rivers, lakes, reservoirs, and aquifers through increasing precipitation.
  • To provide cooling shade, abating heat waves, and reducing energy costs.
  • To provide a method of solar radiation management to cool the surface of the land and oceans, achieving effective climate change mitigation.



The Sky Tap Project

The Sky Tap Project was created to build full-scale units of a ground breaking technology designed to condense invisible water vapor in the clear sky to produce clouds within minutes.

 

                       

This is the pre-requisite to producing reliable precipitation; and has never been done before.

The proof of concept prototype, utilizes uniquely designed wave guides and particle acceleration principles to project an electronic wave which imparts a static electric charge to aerosols at a distance of up to several kilometers, instantly creating condensation nuclei.

And can be seen on this time compressed video of the proof of concept prototype, below:

 


Scientific Support for this Theory

The scientific support for the theory of an electrical influence on water droplets to increase condensation has been published by many atmospheric physicists over the past 60 years, but a viable method of demonstrating the effect in nature has never been found because of a missing key element.  (Visit our website to read more on this theory.)

A recent discovery has made it possible to create a device which has the ability to condense atmospheric humidity and generate clouds in minutes at dew point temperature altitude, which is where a gas will turn to a liquid if condensation nuclei are present.

Throughout history, the scientific community has often been skeptical of the most amazing technologies and declared them to be impossible, offering little or no support. Virtually all ground breaking discoveries were ridiculed by the most notable scientific experts of the day, and yet they have changed our world in tremendous ways for the better. Just as the technology of the Sky Tap Project will accomplish; if we can develop it and demonstrate it to the world.

 

How Would This Work

Developed at full scale, with 10 times greater output capacity than our prototype, a number of portable devices would demonstrate the capability of generating continuous cloud banks to provide controlled shade to the surface of the planet. By producing shade over cities, this will both reduce energy costs for air conditioning in hot climates and reflect solar radiation back into space to reduce heating of the surface and also cool the oceans. 

            

Once the cloud banks have absorbed significant water vapor, due to the hygroscopic effect that is created, they can then be impacted again by the same technology to induce precipitation. This offers total control of the precipitation event as to the timing, location, duration, and volume; providing a viable means to access large quantities of fresh water for arid regions. The controllability of the technology means that there are little or no unintended consequences from its operation. 
 

           

The technology is also effective far inland away from the coast, by utilizing humidity from evap-transporation from vegetation or evaporation. (Visit our website for more examples of operating scenarios on how this technology functions from the surface.)

The success of the technology is dependent upon the level of humidity in the atmosphere and the number of units in operation to condense the water vapor. The lower the humidity, the larger the number of units required for success. To conduct full scale testing in a hot arid region with humidity levels down to 20% would require a total of 20 units to generate clouds and precipitation. But if we acquired funding for at least 6 units we can demonstrate the effect in humidity levels of 60% or greater in a hot arid environment.

The electronic wave projected by the technology through the use of uniquely designed wave guides and particle acceleration principles, is capable of reaching dew point altitude in less than a minute; even if it is a few kilometers in altitude. It will then condense water vapor and generate visible clouds in minutes, providing effective climate change mitigation.

 

How Would We Do This

The most recognized method of rapidly cooling the oceans is through Solar Radiation Management by creating low altitude dense cloud cover. Having a number of these devices mounted on a few hundred of the existing 35,000 large cargo vessels, would generate dense strings of cloudbanks as they travel on regularly scheduled business. 

These clouds will last for days over the ocean due to the increased evaporation from the surface, covering a couple thousand kilometers at a time, and effectively reflect solar radiation back into space. The effectiveness of this can be monitored daily by satellite and the volume of cloud produced can be adjusted as needed, to create the right percentage of Albedo effect to achieve the desired results. (Visit our website for more details on climate change.) 

 

What Has Been Achieved Thus Far

The discovery which makes the process possible was made during research for a Master’s Thesis in 2010 on the subject of rain making, as well as our own revelations during the use of our first prototype from 2007-2009 (which worked effectively - but too slowly to be convincing). Three more prototypes later and we arrived at the perfect match of technology to create the effect captured on the video. It merely needs to be scaled up in size with an increased power output, to be effective in hot climates with low humidity levels.

 

Presenting at a Global Forum

We forwarded our information and scientific support to the steering committee for the Global Forum for Innovation in Agriculture to be held in Abu Dhabi on February 3-5, 2014. This committee comprised of professionals from universities and research institutes specializing in agricultural practices in arid regions, invited us to present our technology to over 2000 delegates from 62 countries, including representatives from 31 universities, as one of the most promising innovations to help feed future populations, and can be found here:

http://www.innovationsinagriculture.com/Event-programme/Project-partners/Pages/The-Sky-Tap-Project 

        

 

An address by Bill Gates emphasizing the importance concerning the Global forum for innovations in agriculture.



Our intent is to interest investors at the GFIA event in supporting the technology. However, we would like to offer an opportunity for the public to take part as the need for fresh water and actions to address climate change affects us all. We would greatly appreciate your support in developing the most promising technology of our time. This will greatly benefit the planet in providing food security and fresh water for drought-stricken areas, as well as to buy us time to make adjustments to more renewable energy sources and reducing atmospheric emissions. There are many more benefits this technology can provide to humanity as indicated on our website.

 

An Investment in Your Future

Providing fresh water to the world will be a benefit to everyone as it will lessen human suffering and hardship, reduce poverty, improve ecosystems, protect species at risk, and reduce conflict over dwindling resources. In short, it will make the world a better place to live for future generations.

There are many other tremendous advantages of a technology which can condense water vapor in the atmosphere within minutes to form clouds or induce precipitation. 

Reducing Heat Waves and Energy Savings:
When heat waves over cities become extreme, this technology can be quickly deployed by governments to create dense cloud banks during the heat of the day to cool the surface and also reduce energy consumption, reducing carbon emissions to produce electricity for air conditioning.

Combating Wildfires and Reducing Insurance Losses:
When large wildfires threaten to destroy critical ecosystems and homes, governments can utilize a battery of these units to quickly generate large cloud banks to cool the fire hazard; and then deposit millions of cubic meters of water on the fire area to reduce the hazard within hours of deployment, and save billions of dollars in insurance claims. 

Dissipating Fog and Increasing Transportation Safety and Scheduling:
The effect projected by the unit will increase the condensation of water droplets in existing clouds and ground fog to form rain drops, which fall out of atmospheric suspension. This will dissipate fog for kilometers in any direction it is targeted within 15-20 minutes. This allows for the clearing of fog from runways at international airports, harbours, and highways to increase transportation safety and maintain traffic schedules, saving the industry billions of dollars annually.

Smog Abatement to Improve Air Quality for Cities:
Creating precipitation over cities in a matter of hours, would clean the air of carcinogenic pollutants harmful to human respiratory systems, and improve the quality of life. There is no other rapid solution to this problem.

Producing Abundant Precipitation over Targeted Areas:
This process can be applied to increasing snow pack in the mountains, replenishing lakes and filling reservoirs for hydroelectric power, or depositing precipitation over agricultural land without the need for hydraulic infrastructure. It can rejuvenate ecosystems by filling rivers and wetlands to bring back biodiversity to the environment. It can end droughts in critical ecosystems such as the Amazon rain forest experienced in 2005 and 2010, killed billions of trees. It will aid in establishing native vegetation and agroforestry to stabilize sand and halt the advance of desertification in many countries. Consistent and regular rainfalls will restore the vitality of agricultural land rendered infertile, due to decades of irrigation from aquifers depositing salts and minerals in the surface.
 

          

 

Why We Need Your Support

All the research to date and constructing four progressively improving prototypes has been paid for with our personal funds. By using our savings and selling personal effects and property including our home, we’ve been able to develop it to this stage. This commitment was because we knew what we had discovered was critical for the planet and would work; if we designed it properly.  Because it is protected as a Trade Secret on the advice of intellectual property lawyers in Canada and the Middle East, we cannot reveal critical details to an investor, prior to them supporting the technology, which has always been requested. To ensure it's built properly and made available to the world, we need to maintain majority control; and for that we need your support. 

The funds raised will be used for…

  • Providing adequate wages to continue the work
  • Help with travel costs to present the project at the Global Forum in February 2014
  • Purchasing better quality components to build the next unit(s)
  • Labour costs to contract specialized manufacturing of certain sections of the unit.
  • Costs for transporting equipment and months of testing the units in various climates to create an operational data base. 


Our funding goals:
We’re asking for funding support for at least two units which is the minimum required to demonstrate the effect in humidity levels of 80% or greater, and with these two units we will be able to obtain investment capital to build many more to complete large scale testing and public demonstration.

To manufacture the units and test them in Canada to create an operational data base, then dismantle and ship them to an arid country to conduct months of further testing in different environments, will cost a little over $420,000 each, and since it takes two units to show the complete process we’re asking for support in the amount of $850,000.  All contributions will aid in developing enough units to provide a large scale demonstration of the technology in an arid region.

If more money is raised, it will go towards building more units that would allow us to be successful in lower humidity environments. With your help, we can ensure these units are built and tested; to allow further success in achieving the goal of bringing an abundant supply of fresh water to the planet.


Our Perks

We would appreciate any contribution amount and have created perks uniquely designed for the Sky Tap Project; and not available anywhere else. They will show the world that you took action to change the future for your children, grandchildren and beyond to make the world a better place for everyone. They will have the opportunity to grow up with sufficient food and water supplies, and a chance to make responsible decisions to reduce over-consumption of our natural resources and to reduce pollution, and degradation of the environment.

[When this campaign ends, you will be contacted for your shirt size(s) and graphic preference (if applicable).]

Because you chose to support the Sky Tap Project, it will allow the world to move beyond simply reacting to droughts, wildfires, and hurricanes; after the fact, and take steps to lessen their impact at the beginning of the event.

We hope you will be a part of history by supporting this technology to ensure it’s a positive outcome for all!

**********************************

If you’re not able to contribute to developing this technology, we thank you for taking the time to read about it; and would greatly appreciate if you could:

  • Personally spread the word to friends and family that a technology like this exists and needs support.
  • Share the project with your friends on Facebook and Twitter as a way for them to benefit people in need, in the best way possible, by making the technology available.

All contributions are tracked by Indiegogo; and the country or state which provides the most support for development will be offered a live public demonstration of the technology on their soil.

We are immensely grateful for your interest and support. Thank you for making this possible! 

**********************************


Frequency Asked Questions

Due to the ability of this technology to produce clouds and extract moisture from the atmosphere there are many concerns (listed below), when one doesn’t fully understand how the technology operates. To find the answers to these questions, please visit the website’s FAQ page. 

  1. Who would benefit the most from this technology?
  2. Is it right to create rain, isn’t that messing with nature?
  3. Won’t there be serious unintended consequences to neighboring countries?
  4. Won’t there be problems trying to remove humidity from the atmosphere in an arid region?
  5. What happens if you remove humidity from the atmosphere that would have produced precipitation for an area downwind? Won’t this create political conflict with neighbors?
  6. Isn’t there a danger of upsetting the moisture balance in the atmosphere which could have unknown consequences to planetary weather patterns?
  7. Does the electronic wave projected from the unit have an adverse effect on
    biological life forms or on aircraft electronics?
  8. Since the world has been looking for a solution like this for a long time and huge budgets exist for research, how come this hasn’t already been invented, if it’s real?
  9. How much fresh water can this technology produce?
  10. What are the operating costs?
  11. If the wind isn’t blowing the right direction how do you get fresh water to your target area?
  12. Won’t this just be used as a weapon?
  13. Wouldn’t one farmer use this to flood out the competition?
  14. Couldn’t a rogue dictator steal all the fresh water on the planet with this technology?
  15. Wouldn’t using this technology to provide solar radiation management for the planet and cooling the oceans, just distract the population from cutting emissions?
  16. Why would this technology be successful as a form of geo-engineering to cool the planet?
  17. What is geo-engineering and how does the Sky Tap Project address this issue? 

 


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

The Sky Tap ProjectThe Sky Tap Project was created to build full-scale units of a ground breaking technology designed to condense invisible water vapor in the clear sky to produce clouds within minutes.                         This is the pre-requisite to producing reliable precipitation; and has never been done before. The proof of concept prototype, utilizes uniquely designed wave guides and particle acceleration principles to project an electronic wave which imparts a static electric charge to aerosols at a distance of up to several kilometers, instantly creating condensation nuclei.And can be seen on this time compressed video of the proof of concept prototype, below: Scientific Support for this TheoryThe scientific support for the theory of an electrical influence on water droplets to increase condensation has been published by many atmospheric physicists over the past 60 years, but a viable method of demonstrating the effect in nature has never been found because of a missing key element.  (Visit our website to read more on this theory.)A recent discovery has made it possible to create a device which has the ability to condense atmospheric humidity and generate clouds in minutes at dew point temperature altitude, which is where a gas will turn to a liquid if condensation nuclei are present. Throughout history, the scientific community has often been skeptical of the most amazing technologies and declared them to be impossible, offering little or no support. Virtually all ground breaking discoveries were ridiculed by the most notable scientific experts of the day, and yet they have changed our world in tremendous ways for the better. Just as the technology of the Sky Tap Project will accomplish; if we can develop it and demonstrate it to the world. How Would This WorkDeveloped at full scale, with 10 times greater output capacity than our prototype, a number of portable devices would demonstrate the capability of generating continuous cloud banks to provide controlled shade to the surface of the planet. By producing shade over cities, this will both reduce energy costs for air conditioning in hot climates and reflect solar radiation back into space to reduce heating of the surface and also cool the oceans.              Once the cloud banks have absorbed significant water vapor, due to the hygroscopic effect that is created, they can then be impacted again by the same technology to induce precipitation. This offers total control of the precipitation event as to the timing, location, duration, and volume; providing a viable means to access large quantities of fresh water for arid regions. The controllability of the technology means that there are little or no unintended consequences from its operation.              The technology is also effective far inland away from the coast, by utilizing humidity from evap-transporation from vegetation or evaporation. (Visit our website for more examples of operating scenarios on how this technology functions from the surface.)The success of the technology is dependent upon the level of humidity in the atmosphere and the number of units in operation to condense the water vapor. The lower the humidity, the larger the number of units required for success. To conduct full scale testing in a hot arid region with humidity levels down to 20% would require a total of 20 units to generate clouds and precipitation. But if we acquired funding for at least 6 units we can demonstrate the effect in humidity levels of 60% or greater in a hot arid environment. The electronic wave projected by the technology through the use of uniquely designed wave guides and particle acceleration principles, is capable of reaching dew point altitude in less than a minute; even if it is a few kilometers in altitude. It will then condense water vapor and generate visible clouds in minutes, providing effective climate change mitigation.  How Would We Do ThisThe most recognized method of rapidly cooling the oceans is through Solar Radiation Management by creating low altitude dense cloud cover. Having a number of these devices mounted on a few hundred of the existing 35,000 large cargo vessels, would generate dense strings of cloudbanks as they travel on regularly scheduled business. These clouds will last for days over the ocean due to the increased evaporation from the surface, covering a couple thousand kilometers at a time, and effectively reflect solar radiation back into space. The effectiveness of this can be monitored daily by satellite and the volume of cloud produced can be adjusted as needed, to create the right percentage of Albedo effect to achieve the desired results. (Visit our website for more details on climate change.)  What Has Been Achieved Thus FarThe discovery which makes the process possible was made during research for a Master’s Thesis in 2010 on the subject of rain making, as well as our own revelations during the use of our first prototype from 2007-2009 (which worked effectively - but too slowly to be convincing). Three more prototypes later and we arrived at the perfect match of technology to create the effect captured on the video. It merely needs to be scaled up in size with an increased power output, to be effective in hot climates with low humidity levels. Presenting at a Global ForumWe forwarded our information and scientific support to the steering committee for the Global Forum for Innovation in Agriculture to be held in Abu Dhabi on February 3-5, 2014. This committee comprised of professionals from universities and research institutes specializing in agricultural practices in arid regions, invited us to present our technology to over 2000 delegates from 62 countries, including representatives from 31 universities, as one of the most promising innovations to help feed future populations, and can be found here:http://www.innovationsinagriculture.com/Event-programme/Project-partners/Pages/The-Sky-Tap-Project           An address by Bill Gates emphasizing the importance concerning the Global forum for innovations in agriculture.Our intent is to interest investors at the GFIA event in supporting the technology. However, we would like to offer an opportunity for the public to take part as the need for fresh water and actions to address climate change affects us all. We would greatly appreciate your support in developing the most promising technology of our time. This will greatly benefit the planet in providing food security and fresh water for drought-stricken areas, as well as to buy us time to make adjustments to more renewable energy sources and reducing atmospheric emissions. There are many more benefits this technology can provide to humanity as indicated on our website.  An Investment in Your FutureProviding fresh water to the world will be a benefit to everyone as it will lessen human suffering and hardship, reduce poverty, improve ecosystems, protect species at risk, and reduce conflict over dwindling resources. In short, it will make the world a better place to live for future generations.There are many other tremendous advantages of a technology which can condense water vapor in the atmosphere within minutes to form clouds or induce precipitation. Reducing Heat Waves and Energy Savings: When heat waves over cities become extreme, this technology can be quickly deployed by governments to create dense cloud banks during the heat of the day to cool the surface and also reduce energy consumption, reducing carbon emissions to produce electricity for air conditioning.Combating Wildfires and Reducing Insurance Losses:When large wildfires threaten to destroy critical ecosystems and homes, governments can utilize a battery of these units to quickly generate large cloud banks to cool the fire hazard; and then deposit millions of cubic meters of water on the fire area to reduce the hazard within hours of deployment, and save billions of dollars in insurance claims.  Dissipating Fog and Increasing Transportation Safety and Scheduling:The effect projected by the unit will increase the condensation of water droplets in existing clouds and ground fog to form rain drops, which fall out of atmospheric suspension. This will dissipate fog for kilometers in any direction it is targeted within 15-20 minutes. This allows for the clearing of fog from runways at international airports, harbours, and highways to increase transportation safety and maintain traffic schedules, saving the industry billions of dollars annually. Smog Abatement to Improve Air Quality for Cities:Creating precipitation over cities in a matter of hours, would clean the air of carcinogenic pollutants harmful to human respiratory systems, and improve the quality of life. There is no other rapid solution to this problem.Producing Abundant Precipitation over Targeted Areas:This process can be applied to increasing snow pack in the mountains, replenishing lakes and filling reservoirs for hydroelectric power, or depositing precipitation over agricultural land without the need for hydraulic infrastructure. It can rejuvenate ecosystems by filling rivers and wetlands to bring back biodiversity to the environment. It can end droughts in critical ecosystems such as the Amazon rain forest experienced in 2005 and 2010, killed billions of trees. It will aid in establishing native vegetation and agroforestry to stabilize sand and halt the advance of desertification in many countries. Consistent and regular rainfalls will restore the vitality of agricultural land rendered infertile, due to decades of irrigation from aquifers depositing salts and minerals in the surface.             Why We Need Your SupportAll the research to date and constructing four progressively improving prototypes has been paid for with our personal funds. By using our savings and selling personal effects and property including our home, we’ve been able to develop it to this stage. This commitment was because we knew what we had discovered was critical for the planet and would work; if we designed it properly.  Because it is protected as a Trade Secret on the advice of intellectual property lawyers in Canada and the Middle East, we cannot reveal critical details to an investor, prior to them supporting the technology, which has always been requested. To ensure it's built properly and made available to the world, we need to maintain majority control; and for that we need your support. The funds raised will be used for…
Providing adequate wages to continue the work
Help with travel costs to present the project at the Global Forum in February 2014
Purchasing better quality components to build the next unit(s) 
Labour costs to contract specialized manufacturing of certain sections of the unit.
Costs for transporting equipment and months of testing the units in various climates to create an operational data base. 
Our funding goals:We’re asking for funding support for at least two units which is the minimum required to demonstrate the effect in humidity levels of 80% or greater, and with these two units we will be able to obtain investment capital to build many more to complete large scale testing and public demonstration. To manufacture the units and test them in Canada to create an operational data base, then dismantle and ship them to an arid country to conduct months of further testing in different environments, will cost a little over $420,000 each, and since it takes two units to show the complete process we’re asking for support in the amount of $850,000.  All contributions will aid in developing enough units to provide a large scale demonstration of the technology in an arid region.If more money is raised, it will go towards building more units that would allow us to be successful in lower humidity environments. With your help, we can ensure these units are built and tested; to allow further success in achieving the goal of bringing an abundant supply of fresh water to the planet.Our PerksWe would appreciate any contribution amount and have created perks uniquely designed for the Sky Tap Project; and not available anywhere else. They will show the world that you took action to change the future for your children, grandchildren and beyond to make the world a better place for everyone. They will have the opportunity to grow up with sufficient food and water supplies, and a chance to make responsible decisions to reduce over-consumption of our natural resources and to reduce pollution, and degradation of the environment. [When this campaign ends, you will be contacted for your shirt size(s) and graphic preference (if applicable).] Because you chose to support the Sky Tap Project, it will allow the world to move beyond simply reacting to droughts, wildfires, and hurricanes; after the fact, and take steps to lessen their impact at the beginning of the event. We hope you will be a part of history by supporting this technology to ensure it’s a positive outcome for all!**********************************If you’re not able to contribute to developing this technology, we thank you for taking the time to read about it; and would greatly appreciate if you could:
Personally spread the word to friends and family that a technology like this exists and needs support.
Share the project with your friends on Facebook and Twitter as a way for them to benefit people in need, in the best way possible, by making the technology available. 
All contributions are tracked by Indiegogo; and the country or state which provides the most support for development will be offered a live public demonstration of the technology on their soil. We are immensely grateful for your interest and support. Thank you for making this possible! **********************************Frequency Asked QuestionsDue to the ability of this technology to produce clouds and extract moisture from the atmosphere there are many concerns (listed below), when one doesn’t fully understand how the technology operates. To find the answers to these questions, please visit the website’s FAQ page. 
Who would benefit the most from this technology?
Is it right to create rain, isn’t that messing with nature? 
Won’t there be serious unintended consequences to neighboring countries?
Won’t there be problems trying to remove humidity from the atmosphere in an arid region?
What happens if you remove humidity from the atmosphere that would have produced precipitation for an area downwind? Won’t this create political conflict with neighbors?
Isn’t there a danger of upsetting the moisture balance in the atmosphere which could have unknown consequences to planetary weather patterns?
Does the electronic wave projected from the unit have an adverse effect onbiological life forms or on aircraft electronics?
Since the world has been looking for a solution like this for a long time and huge budgets exist for research, how come this hasn’t already been invented, if it’s real?
How much fresh water can this technology produce?
What are the operating costs?
If the wind isn’t blowing the right direction how do you get fresh water to your target area?
Won’t this just be used as a weapon?
Wouldn’t one farmer use this to flood out the competition?
Couldn’t a rogue dictator steal all the fresh water on the planet with this technology?
Wouldn’t using this technology to provide solar radiation management for the planet and cooling the oceans, just distract the population from cutting emissions?
Why would this technology be successful as a form of geo-engineering to cool the planet?
What is geo-engineering and how does the Sky Tap Project address this issue?  
 THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT  

I have worked in the travel industry for 20 years, I am currently a Flight Attendant with a large commercial carrier; over the past four years I have been working on and have developed a patent pending product that is sure to revolutionize the current marketplace moreover, approximately 80% of our product is developed by US vendors, suppliers and eco-friendly manufacturers.

Simply ask yourself: What is the first thing people ask for when they step onto an aircraft?

Answer:  A pillow and a blanket. 


As you walk through the terminal on any given day you will see numerous people either carrying their own bed pillow, a u-shaped beanbag pillow in their arms/hands or clipped onto their luggage and I’ve even seen them on the tops of people’s heads and my first impression: that’s unhygienic and cumbersome, we live in a Hands-Free society...There has to be a better way!

So I developed The Dream Butler TMTravel Bag which offer several solutions for the consumer not only are they light weight and durable but more importantly the roomy tote offers  dual compartments, the main portion comes with a padded computer compartment and is expandable which allows you to bring along all your travel essentials there is a smaller separate outer compartment which includes a Personal Travel-size Foam Pillow, Personal Heavy-weight Fleece Blanket and a Personal Lap Board which when placed on the back-side of the custom designed Pillow becomes an instant workstation.

The Dream Butler TM Carry-all with Pillow, Blanket and Lapboard was created because I realized there was nothing on the market that consolidated all the in-flight needs of the traveler in one convenient carry-on bag...something that would virtually provide for hands-free travel.

I collaborated and consulted with co-workers, friends and business associates (numerous Flight Attendants, a Chiropractor, and an Industrial Manufacturer) and many, many others.

I applied all the insider trade secrets I learned from my many years of travel and all that I learned from commuting Flight Attendants and other Travel Professional.

I set out to design the perfect combination Travel Pillow and Tote; I tested countless prototypes with foams and fabrics.

Finally, the Patent Pending, Trademarked and Copyrighted Dream Butler was created.

So whether you're a student, a globe-trotter, jet-setter, soccer mom, business commuter or spending the day in the park, The Dream Butler TM products will make the trip more comfortable. 

Personally speaking, I believe The Dream Butler TM Carry-all is an essential travel item and is the ONLY combination Travel Pillow, Tote, Blanket and Lapboard on the market.



These features when all combined makes this the ultimate-must have Travel Tote The Dream Butler TM makes for hands-free, stress-free travel so the consumer can travel in Style and Comfort hence our slogan:

  Dream ButlerTM Master the Art of Travel...


What We Need & What You Get

  Now that the research and development phase of this project has been completed we are at the phase where we NEED to raise FUNDS for the marketing and media campaign initiative.

  • Consequently, we have met with a representative of the QVC Home Shopping Network and they "LOVE" the product but here’s the thing, in order to have your product launched/showcased in that manner: you must supply an extremely large amount of inventory.

 

  • It takes an enormous amount of capital to produce that level of inventory and time for the product to be manufactured and then be processed through the Quality Assurance department.

 

  • An infusion of capital in the form of 250,000.00 from various donors and/or Angel Investor would help to launch this important product into the marketplace. 

 

  • The funds will be used not only for initial inventory but will also help launch a media marketing ad campaign to get the word out.  

We have been able to use this platform to support numerous American Owned and Operated Businesses and allow us to work with manufacturers who are eco-friendly by developing chemical-free memory foam products and manufacturers who recycle and use bio-degradable materials as a "green choice" alternative. 

My pledge is to continue to do this (approximately 80% of start-up and development cost was used/spent with US vendors and suppliers) to support this effort.

Here is a short list of USA suppliers and vendors we have worked with in developing this product.

Legal Zoom, Quick Patents, Federal Express, UPS, USPS, Delaware Division of Revenue, ZZ House-graphics and printing, U-Line, Print Craft, NCFI Polyurethanes, B.J. Con-Sew, General Labels, Bekaert Textiles USA, Jackie Tumaian Photography just to name a few...

  

     HOW CAN YOU HELP?

  • Your contributions will fuel this project and help us to reach our goals. We can’t get anywhere without you so first and foremost PLEDGE and make a Donation today! 

But remember - even if you can’t make a contribution, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

 

  • Equally as important, spreading the word and share the campaign via the Indiegogo tools, on social networks, blogs and forums--basically anywhere and everywhere. Tell your friends, family and work colleague to get the word out and make some noise about the Dream Butler campaign and visit the Dream Butler website at: www.dreambutler.com to purchase your very own Dream Butler tote (small quantity available for purchase).

 

         HOW DOES THIS COLLECTIVE FUNDING WORK?

 

  • It’s Simple, You pledge any amount of money you choose (see the sidebar to the right) to support this initiative to raise funds in the amount of 250,000.00 for initial Inventory and for Marketing the Dream Butler tote in return you receive a PERK for your donation.

 

  •  In addition, no matter what - the majority of the funds will be used to support other US vendors, suppliers and eco-friendly manufacturers with your help collectively we can make a difference and support one another.

 

          Thanking you in advance, for your kind consideration!   

 

Terri Stewart
